00034 function errorHandler($errno, $errstr, $errfile, $errline)
00035 {
00036     static $errorTypes;
00037     
00038     $errorTypes = array (
00039         2   => "Warning",
00040         8   => "Notice",
00041         256 => "User Error",
00042         512 => "User Warning",
00043         1024=> "User Notice",
00044         4096=> "Recoverable Error"
00045     );
00046     
00047     $dieStatus = ($errno==256) ? TRUE : FALSE;
00048     
00049         showHtmlMessage(
00050         $errorTypes[$errno],
00051         "<div class=\"topic\">Message:</div> <span id=\"msg\">"  . $errstr
00052          . " ({$errno})</span><br/>\n".
00053         "<div class=\"topic\">In file:</div> <span id=\"file\">" . $errfile
00054          . "</span><br/>\n"            .
00055         "<div class=\"topic\">On line:</div> <span id=\"line\">#". $errline
00056          . "</span>\n",
00057         $dieStatus
00058         );
00059 
00060     return true;
00061 }

00071 {
